mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article (user_id, title, markdown_text, released_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{markdownText}, #{releasedAt})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM article WHERE id = #{id} LIMIT 1

select article.title, article.id, (select COUNT(*) from user_like_article where article.id = article_id) like_count from article, user_like_article where article.released_at > DATE_SUB(now(), interval '7' DAY) order by like_count desc LIMIT 20;
